STATE OF MICHIGAN
DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
GRETCHEN WHITMER
LANS ING
ELIZABETH HERTEL
GOVERNOR DIRECTOR
January 26, 2023
Elizabeth Hellman
NORTHPOINTE BEHAVIORAL HEALTHCARE SYSTEMS
715 PYLE DR,
KINGSFORD, MI, 49802-4456
RE: License#: CN220269295
NORTHPOINTE BEHAVIORAL HEALTHCARE SYSTEMS
715 PYLE DR,
KINGSFORD, MI, 49802-4456
Dear Ms. Hellman,
Attached is the Renewal Inspection Report for the above referenced facility completed on
January 18, 2023. Due to the violations, a written corrective action plan is required. It should
be noted that violations of any licensing statutes rules and are also violations of the
MISEP and your contract. The corrective action plan is due 15 days from the date of this
letter and must include the following:
• How compliance with each citation will be achieved.
• Who is directly responsible for implementing the corrective action for each
licensing statute and rule or section of the contract or MISEP citation.
• Specific time frames for each citation as to when the correction will be
completed or implemented.
• How continuing compliance will be maintained once compliance is
achieved.
• The signature of the responsible party and a date.
Upon receipt of an acceptable corrective action plan, a regular license will be issued. If
you fail to submit an acceptable corrective action plan, disciplinary action will result.
P.O. BOX 30650 • LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909
www.michigan.gov • (517) 335-1980

Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager Kari Muntean, Area Manager, at 734-395-
0920.
Sincerely,
Douglas W Turrill, Licensing Consultant
enclosure

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing statutes and rules except
for the following:
CPA Rule 400.12212 Personnel Records
(2) The personnel record shall contain all of the
following information before employment may occur:
(h) Documentation from the department that the person
has not been named in a central registry case as the
perpetrator of child abuse or neglect in Michigan or in
any state where the person lived in the 5 years
preceding hire.
Two of three personnel files reviewed did not contain a central registry clearance.
2.) Any violation listed in section 1 is also an MISEP violation. Please note that there are
additional MISEP requirements that may not be included in section 1. The facility is in
compliance will all additional MISEP requirements.
3.) MDHHS Contract: The agency is non-contracted.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
Technical assistance was not provided at this time.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility was offered consultation in the following areas
.
Consultation was provided regarding licensing of foster homes. Specifically, the
agency licensing worker asked what are common rule violations regarding the
licensing of homes. I discussed several common rule violations and offered
consultation on how to avoid rule violations and meet standards under the rules.
Consultation was provided regarding the writing of corrective action plans. The Chief
Administrator was provided the “Corrective Action Plan” form with instructions on
how to write a comprehensive, effective correction action plan.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this
licensing period.
The Interim Inspection completed on February 24, 2022, did not establish any rule
violations. In addition, there were no complaints filed against the agency during the
licensing period.

VII. CPA ANALYST FINDINGS
The agency is non-contracted and therefore the CPA Analyst was not required to
conduct home visits.
VIII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is not in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules and/or MISEP requirements and/or contract/policy. Upon receipt of
an acceptable corrective action plan, it is recommended that the facility will be issued a
renewal of their regular license.
January 25, 2023
Douglas W Turrill Date
Licensing Consultant
Approved By:
January 26, 2023
Kari Muntean Date
Area Manager
